SEARCH

Uses of Package
fr.uge.patchwork

  • Classes in fr.uge.patchwork used by fr.uge.patchwork
    Class
    Description
    GameView
    An interface representing the game's interface
    Patch
    A record representing a patch with the number of buttons it contains, its price, the number of steps to take on the time board, its height, its width and its shape
    Player
    A class representing a player of the game
    QuiltBoard
    A class representing a quilt board where a player can place his patches
    SimpleGameData
    A class representing the data of the game of Patchwork This class provides all the necessary informations to make the game work
    SimpleGameView
    A record representing the graphic display version of the game where xOrigin and yOrigin are the coordinates of the time board, height and width represent the dimensions of the time board, squareSize is the size of a square in all boards and widthWindow and heightWindow are the dimensions of the window
